songs.title: Love Is Prelude (Live at the North Sea Jazz Festival, 2005)
songs.lyrics:
Yo, let's do "Love", man, I wanna do "Love" right now

One thing we, one thing no matter what walk of life you from
In what city you from, or you know, what type of music you do
Or what's your profession, one thing in the basement we do is spread love, you know
We want love, we love love, and you know
Love is the most important thing we can have in this world
You know, 'cause God is love, you know
And when we talk about love, we're talking about loving ourselves
And being able to love God and love others as we love ourselves
And love the music we do and hopefully love the things we do in our professions, you know
Loving the nature, and loving even your enemies, man
It ain't easy but that's what we gotta do
When you really love, love is unconditional
